Models¶

Model.burnout_prediction.data_encoder(df)¶

Funtion to transform all categorical features into dummy variables param: df pd.DataFrame

Model.burnout_prediction.evalu_model(model, xtrain, xtest, ytrain, ytest)¶

Function to evaluate model performance through cross validation. Metrics to evaluate performance: R-sqaured and mean squared error

param: model param: xtrain pd.DataFrame param: xtest pd.DataFrame param: ytrain pd.DataFrame param: ytest pd.DataFrame returns: tuple r2_train, r2_test, mse_train, mse_test floats

Model.burnout_prediction.get_data()¶

Download dataset and saved under folder “data” in working directory

Model.burnout_prediction.linear_regression(xtrain, xtest, ytrain, ytest)¶

Predict burn rate using linear regression model param: xtrain pd.DataFrame param: xtest pd.DataFrame param: ytrain pd.DataFrame param: ytest pd.DataFrame

returns: lr classifier

Model.burnout_prediction.tree_model(xtrain, xtest, ytrain, ytest)¶

Predict burout rate using gradient boosting model output both point estimation and predict interval

param: xtrain pd.DataFrame param: xtest pd.DataFrame param: ytrain pd.DataFrame param: ytest pd.DataFrame

returns: treemodel classifier

Model.burnout_prediction.wfh_encoder(data)¶

Function to encode variable “WFH Setup Available” as binary variable param: data pd.DataFrame
